title: What is Sociapol ?
description: Developed by the Negentra team, Sociapol will open the doors of a virtual world for you. In this virtual space, you will find many different ways of having fun and creating characters. You will be interacting with this world along with many other users.

title: What is Sociapol ?
description: Sociapol is constantly evolving and updating itself, and will always find ways of presenting new ways of spending an incredibly fun time. You can play football, join fun and exciting activities or become the heart of the party. Or, just make some transactions using the crypto infrastructure. All of this is possible in the world of Sociapol.

title: What is Sociapol ?
description: Sociapol allows you to create your own character to represent you in this world. You can purchase lootboxes to get new customizing gear as NFT’s for your avatar, enjoy our seasonal special collections, and trade with other players on our NFT marketplace.

title: What is Sociapol ?
description: Sociapol rewards you for every action you take when you are here. Whether you are playing games, socializing with other users or creating content for other to enjoy, you will earn our native token SPOL as a reward – you can use SPOL to purchase NFT’s at our marketplace or trade it on an exchange.
